m_szDocSumamry: Toyota Mirai's Hydrogen Fuel Cell Vehicle Drives 312 Miles on a Single Tank 13 SHARES ADD TO COMPARE The new Toyota Mirai hydrogen fuel cell vehicle has proved it can go the distance, achieving 67 mpg in official US combined city/highway driving calculations, and an estimated driving range of 312 miles on a single tank – a distance further than for any other zero-emissions car on the market. The US Environmental Protection Agency’s (EPA) fuel economy rating for Mirai was announced at the recent Aspen Ideas Festival in Colorado. It confirms that Mirai is the only zero emissions electric vehicle
